SEARCH
Package edu.rpi.legup.app

Class LegupPreferences

java.lang.Object
edu.rpi.legup.app.LegupPreferences
public class LegupPreferences extends Object
LegupPreferences is a class responsible for managing user preferences within the application. It uses Java's Preferences API to store and retrieve preferences, and it provides methods for accessing and updating these preferences.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static LegupPreferences getInstance()
      Gets the legup preferences singleton instance This method ensures that only one instance of LegupPreferences exists
      Returns:
      the singleton instance of LegupPreferences

    • getUserPref

      public String getUserPref(String key)
      Gets the user preference by the string key
      Parameters:
      key - key name of the preference
      Returns:
      value of the preference or null if the preference does not exist

    • setUserPref

      public void setUserPref(String key, String value)
      Sets the user preference for the specified key to the provided value
      Parameters:
      key - key to set for the preference
      value - value to set for the preference

    • getUserPrefAsBool

      public boolean getUserPrefAsBool(String key)
      Retrieves the user preference associated with the specified key as a boolean
      Parameters:
      key - the key for the preference to retrieve
      Returns:
      the boolean value of the preference
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the preference value cannot be interpreted as a boolean

    • getSavedPath

      public String getSavedPath()
      Gets the saved path
      Returns:
      the saved path as a String

    • setSavedPath

      public void setSavedPath(String path)
      Sets the saved path to the specified value
      Parameters:
      path - the new saved path
